notes.text:
This update for gfbgraph fixes the following issues:

- CVE-2021-39358: Fixed missing TLS certificate verification (bsc#1189850).
notes.title: Description of the patch

notes.text: In GNOME libgfbgraph through 0.2.4, gfbgraph-photo.c does not enable TLS certificate verification on the SoupSessionSync objects it creates, leaving users vulnerable to network MITM attacks. NOTE: this is similar to CVE-2016-20011.
notes.title: Vulnerability description
